scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm run install:all && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../pythia && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clean:pyright && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:extension
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:extension: cd extension && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:pythia: cd pythia && npm run package && cd ..
scripts.build:pyrightDebug: cd server/pyright && npm run build:clientServerDebug && cd ../..
scripts.clean:pyright: cd server/pyright && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:pyright
scripts.package: npm run clean:all && cd server && npm run build && npx webpack && cd ../extension && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.pack:extension-debug: cd extension && npm run webpack-debug && cd ..
scripts.pack:extension: cd extension && npm run webpack && cd ..
scripts.test:all: cd server && npm run test:all && cd ../extension && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:all:pipeline: cd server && npm run test:all:pipeline && cd ../extension && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:all-except-extension:pipeline: cd server && npm run test:all:pipeline && cd ..
